name: DOLPHIN / PSYCHIC / VACUUM / JAZZ
description:
DOLPHIN / PSYCHIC / VACUUM / JAZZ is a game about character-building and choices! Or maybe it's a numbers puzzle. Or both.

You have four stats: DOLPHIN, PSYCHIC, VACUUM, and JAZZ. You can buy them with talent points at the start of the game. The first point in each stat costs 1 talent; every point after that costs 1 more than the one before. You can spend a total of 100 talents.

Then, you will face six encounters. Each one will offer you a choice of two approaches. You get score equal to the stat you use. Get your score as high as possible!

🥉 A score of 30 or more is a good result, especially on your first try.
🥈 A score of 45 or more is excellent. Consider this a win!
🥇 A score of 50 is the highest possible. If you want to challenge yourself.
